education.school: S K N HGH SCOOL, TERDAL

experiences.description: Spearheading recruitment and onboarding processes to onboard top talent and ensure smooth transitions. Ensuring all employee records are maintained and updated with new hire information or changes in employment status. Managing payroll processing, Provident Fund (PF), and statutory payments for accurate financial operations. Overseeing employee records, attendance tracking, and leaves management to enhance organizational efficiency. Actively solving employee queries regarding Attendance, Payroll, PF, etc. thereby improved employee satisfaction. Resolving challenges through effective problem-solving and meticulous attention to detail. Facilitating seamless communication, teamwork, and confidentiality maintenance across departments. Leveraging HRMS, Payroll Software, and Microsoft Office tools for efficient HR management and reporting. Streamlining settlement procedures, minimizing turnaround time, and enhancing employee satisfaction. Contributing to organizational growth through proactive HR MIS reporting and process optimization.

Proficiently manage HR functions including employee joining formalities, attendance, leaves, payroll processing, and full & final settlement, as per the company policies and statutory requirements. Collaborating with HOD and Asst. Manager (HR & Welfare) on employee welfare activities, including accommodation, canteen supervision, and uniform/safety shoe distribution. Proficient in Provident fund, ensuring timely compliance and accurate record-keeping for seamless operations. Diligently maintain employee records, confidentiality and data accuracy, utilizing HRMS software and Excel for efficient HR data management and MIS reporting. Facilitate between departments, resolving queries and ensuring employee support for smooth HR operations. Processing timely and accurate compensation distribution and managing employee benefits like PF & ESIC, Bonus, Leave encashment and Interest free education loan, medical loan, marriage loan, etc. Ensure seamless exit processes and full & final settlement, maintaining professionalism and confidentiality throughout the employee lifecycle. Coordinated annual employee health checkups, ensuring timely and comprehensive medical evaluations for all staff.

Collecting & tracking daily attendance for 150+ security staff members. Preparing and submitting post-wise headcount summaries and monthly attendance sheets to employer. Preparing and maintaining critical audit compliance reports including muster roll, wage register, and bonus register, etc. with high accuracy. Coordinating uniform and safety shoes and other equipment distribution to security staff. Acted as a liaison between headquarters and on-site staff for payroll, PF and other related issues, enhancing communication and resolution efficiency. Addressed and resolved employee queries on time regarding attendance, payroll, PF, etc. and thereby improved employee satisfaction. Verifying and monthly payroll invoice and submitting for approval. Producing precise & error-free reports and submitting them on time, thereby improved employer satisfaction.

Responsible for the collection and verification of documents loan recovery, cash collection and timely bank deposits. Handling ensuring accuracy and compliance. Responsible prospective clients to maintain high standards of due diligence. Acquiring new clients, contributing to the growth and expansion of the customer base. Coordinating in disbursement of loans, ensuring all financial transactions were executed according to policy. Maintained accurate financial records by preparing cash books and recording daily transactions. Conducted diligent follow-ups on overdue payments to improve financial health and minimize defaults.

full_output.name: PRAVEEN PUKALE
achievements_and_awards: Achieved distinction in 12th (PUC- Commerce) and ranked among the top ten candidates, showcasing academic excellence and dedication.
Attained second rank in graduation while maintaining high academic standards, reflecting consistent performance and commitment to success.
Won first prize in various college cultural events like Treasure Hunt, Antakshari and Group Discussion, demonstrating strong teamwork and communication skills.
